name: Bloons Plane Defense
description:
Fly through the skies and pop as much bloons as possible. BUT be warned as you only have a limited amount of fuel left that you can replenish using gas canisters.

Controls:
W - Throttle
AD - Roll left/right
R - Restart
Mouse - Player Look
ESC - Exit Game

Programmer: https://paksuuu.itch.io
Artist: https://cheeeeesecake.itch.io/

Assets Used: 10 Skyboxes Pack : Day - Night
Music by Sappheiros.
Sound effects from freesound.org.
